name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza topped with mozzarella cheese and fresh basil.

description: Juicy beef patty with cheddar cheese, lettuce, and tomato.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.

description: Pasta with rich tomato and meat sauce topped with parmesan.

description: Soft corn tortillas filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, and salsa.

name: Chicken Curry
description: Spicy chicken curry served with steamed rice.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Rich chocolate cake with a layer of fudge frosting.
